thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com
thread.title: Jessica
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: It is great to find a place that has advice and products for me. I became totally incontinent and have to wear 24/7 and found little help or support at the hospital and rehab. Because of my need for leg and back braces I needed super absorbency and less leaks and the NorthShore and Abena's with boosters are amazing. The GaryWear pants are also fantastic. Thank you and keep up the good work
